comments.content:
I have one in my sign program that is similar, but it would need to be stretched in height. Here is a link to it on the web. If you key it in, you may be able to find it on a source you trust....I just grabbed this one, can't vouch for the font site.

Font is called: Square Slab 711 Bd Bt

[http://www.freefontsdb.com/detail/1541/SquareSlab711-Bd-BT-Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420205452/http:/www.freefontsdb.com/detail/1541/SquareSlab711-Bd-BT-Bold "http://www.freefontsdb.com/detail/1541/SquareSlab711-Bd-BT-Bold")

Pep, please don’t provide links to pirated fonts.

Square Slabserif 711 is licensed by Bitstream. It is not a free font:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/square-slabserif-711/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420205452/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/square-slabserif-711/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/square-slabserif-711/")
